short_summary: Navigation system and equipment for Scientific Diving
description: a system for navigation, communication and monitoring for scientific diving
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Contract Summary

**Notification ID:** WS3952848107-Doc3989772852  
**Title:** Navigation, Communication and Monitoring System for Scientific Diving  
**Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)  
**End User:** Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)  
**Contract Details:**

*   **Publication Date:** May 15, 2023  
*   **Tender Closing Date:** May 23, 2023 2:00 PM EST  
*   **Amendment Date:** May 15, 2023  
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** May 1, 2023  
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A  
*   **Tender Status:** Open  
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)  
*   **Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)  
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contract Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO), is seeking a supplier to provide a Navigation, Communication, and Monitoring System for Scientific Diving.

This system will facilitate safe and successful scientific diving operations in a marine environment, ensuring the safety of personnel, and the protection of the marine ecosystem.

**Required Deliverables:**

*   A fully integrated and functional system for navigation, communication, and monitoring of scientific diving operations, meeting all relevant safety and environmental standards.
*   A comprehensive user manual and technical documentation to facilitate system operation and maintenance.
*   Relevant training and support for clients, ensuring successful adoption and operation of the system.

**Contract Preferences:**

The PSPC/SPAC reserves the right to evaluate price and any other information submitted by the Applicant, to makes an informed decision. Interested Suppliers are encouraged to express interest by sending an email to [simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca).

### Additional Information

*   Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   Contact Information:
    *   Name: Simon Presse  
    *   Email: [simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)  
    *   Phone: N/A  
    *   Fax: N/A
